title: A slideshow.
review: Blade Runner 2049 is a slideshow masterpiece, from a graphic POV. However, its slides don't have a good transition between them and its presentation: limp.

title: A Must see before Avenger Endgame
review:
Last time i went in theater was years ago, I'm glad i went back to it to see Captain Marvel.This is a pretty good movie, I don't understand those negative review. You'll enjoy these 2 hours. Stay for both of the post generic scene, they are really important imo.
You have to see this if you want to see Avenger Endgame.
This movie is more of a 7,5/10 for a superhero movie, but i had to put 9 in balance for negative reviews.
Though, The movie is just a little disapoiting around the end. No, there is no feminist message (Well there are 2 sentences in the whole movie, and one of them is a joke).

title: Thank you for what you created Marvel
review:
Avengers - Endgame offers a stunning and moving ending.
There are times to laugh, but also times to cry. Many did at the end.
Thank you Marvel.

title: Thank you Marvel.
review:
Avengers - Endgame offers a stunning and moving ending. The best I could've expected.
Many people cried...
Thank you Marvel for this experience, I don't know If it'll ever happen again.
